title: Table Row Counts (Key Tables) / Tablo Satır Sayıları (Anahtar Tablolar)
description: Monitors row counts in critical EBS tables to track data growth and identify tables requiring maintenance

queries.sql: SELECT OWNER, TABLE_NAME, NUM_ROWS, BLOCKS, LAST_ANALYZED FROM DBA_TABLES WHERE OWNER IN ('APPS', 'APPLSYS', 'APPSSTD') AND NUM_ROWS > 100000 ORDER BY NUM_ROWS DESC

doc_hint: Monitor large tables (NUM_ROWS > 100k) for growth trends. Check LAST_ANALYZED is recent. If > 30 days old, recommend statistics refresh. Watch for unusual growth spikes.
analysis_prompt: Identify largest EBS tables by row count. Calculate block allocation ratio. Flag any with stale statistics or unexpected growth. Recommend maintenance if needed.
